The Horde helped out The Circle of Flame. This faction now considers The Horde, Helpful and This faction will help The Horde if it causes no problems or significant cost for them. They expect the same from The Horde.
The Foundation helped out The Red Sashes. This faction now considers The Foundation, Neutral and This faction has other concerns than The Foundation
The Forgotten Gods moved against Ministry of Preservation. This faction now considers The Forgotten Gods, at War and This faction will go out of its way to hurt The Forgotten Gods even if itâ€™s not in their best interest to do so. They expect The Forgotten Gods to do the same, and take precautions against The Forgotten Gods.
The Gray Cloaks moved against Inspectors. This faction now considers The Gray Cloaks, Neutral and This faction has other concerns than The Gray Cloaks
